other_title: Phantom Master--Dark Hero From Ruined Empire
Shin angyō onshi: Ostatni strażnik magii (Polish)
plot: The Amen Osa were secret agents of the king of Jushin. But when Jushin is destroyed only one Amen Osa remains, Moonse. Moonse meets a traveler named Monlyon in the desert, and after hearing the story goes to rescue Monlyon's fiance...
insert_song: "Song With No Name~Namae no Nai Uta~" by BoA
